transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello. Hanji. Ji. Main ji main Ranjeet bol raha tha aapka account number. Udhar unse baat hui hai yaar tumhare senior se yaar do do baar 10-10 baar baat karunga kya unse?
Executive: Udhar se kitni baar hui hai mangalwar ko payment aayegi. Mangalwar ko payment aayegi ab koi baat kuch nahi hai mere hath mein. Pichle payment de di thi humne. Pichle humne baat ki thi aap se ki payment padi hai. Ab mangalwar ko aayegi payment.
Customer: Kal main gaya tha sham ko payment mili nahi mere ko.
Executive: To sir mangalwar ko aap karke market mein. Bhaiya market mein manda ho raha hai payment nahi de rahe log meri.
Customer: Mera to yahi hai. Ha mangalwar ko bhi payment mangalwar ko.
Executive: Mera kehne ka matlab ye hai sir mangalwar ko payment karke kahan karoge payment sir catalog to rehna chahiye.
Customer: Main band karwa dunga fir kya kam hai bhaiya catalog payment aayegi tabhi karega. Jab thi tabhi tumne manne nahi 52000 mein agar aaj 52000 mein karwa do aaj ho jayegi payment batao. Jab main tumhare sir 52000 to hum de hi nahi sakte na aapko hum kabhi nahi bolenge ki sir aap agar aaj 52000 karwa main bola aaj to 52000 kar ya 50000 kar aaj to hogi nahi aaj thodi nahi hai payment meri ye tumhare senior ki wording hai ki agar aaj 52000 karata hu to aaj payment ho jayegi.
Executive: Nahi sir 52 mein to hoga hi nahi 57 ka hi hoga agar aapko karna hai to sir aap kar lijiye koi dikat nahi hai. Mere se bas malum hai kisne call kiya main aapko pata hai kisne call kiya main bas yahi puchne ke liye kiya tha ki aap mujhe ek batao jaise ki aapne directly bola na ki mere ko mangalwar ko paise aayega bas mere ko yahi janna tha mere ko bas yahi sunna tha ki aap senior ko dekho main kal gaya tha payment lene waste kal kisi ne bhi payment nahi di jin jin ke 30000 ka mal apna kal unhone 55000 pakdae ek do ne to 5000 pakdae ek baki ne pakdae hi nahi agle keh rahe ki kam mein manda hai ji agle hafte aana ye jo din hota hai na nahi hota sir aap logo ke pass are bhai main unko dhta hu bhai are bhai main unko dhta hu aise business nahi hota agle mal lena band kar denge mere se agla manda ke hote hai.
Executive: Agar sir abhi aapko ek do lakh ka saman kharidna hoga ya fir kuch aisa hoga to fir aap kya karoge sir matlab ki sir kuch bhi to aap business ke liye soch ke to rakhe hoge na yaar ki ha mera business chal raha hai aapko 4 november se pata tha ki 4 november se aapka renewal due hai.
Customer: ke baad
Executive: Main genuinely puch raha hu ek normal insan ki tarah puch raha hu ki aapne business ke liye to kuch to soch ke rakha hoga aapne saturday ko mujhse manga maine turant apne apne senior ke super senior ko call karke aapko proposal karwa ke diya sir aapne wo bhi nahi kiya fir aap mera call utha ke aapne read kara nahi sabne bataya hua hai.
Customer: sab.
Executive: Sir dekhiye agar aap bol rahe ho ki mangalwar ko aapka payment aayega to mangalwar ko payment aane ke baad bhi aap mat karna sir main aapko simple sa bol raha hu agar aapko
Customer: nahi sir dekho main aapko na simple sa hi bata raha hu main aapko simple hi bata diya dekho main aapko shani dekho main aapko us din friday ko apne kitni baar kaha apne message padho aapke senior ko bhi kaha maine mangal budhwar virwar shukar specially kaha ki bhaiya payment padi hai aap kya aap kya bol rahe the aap kya bol rahe the ki 52 52 karke 52 nahi sakte are nahi sakte sir suniye suniye aapke liye ek main simple kar deta hu aap service kar lo sir aap abhi MDC service kar lo sir 33000 ka kyu mera aayega mangalwar ko 30000 plus GST kar do last time 30000 plus GST hua tha kar sakte ho 30000 plus GST ha kis cheez ka 30000 plus GST sir jo last time maine MDC karwaya tha 30000 plus GST karwaya tha karwa sakte ho tab main apne payment karwa sakta hu aap karwa suno sir agar aap bol rahe ho apne words mein bhi to main apne words mein bhi raunga agar aap ek minute jab tum jab tum 35 ke 30 sakte ho to 57 ke 52 nahi sakte jab tum 35 ke 30 sakte ho to 57 ke 52 nahi sakte sir aap meri baat suno jab 35 ke 30 hai na 32 main wahi cheez aapko bol raha hu sir agar aap jo bol rahe ho ki sir MDC ka service main MDC nahi hai maine to yahi hai main to main mere bas ki nahi hai 40 sir dekhiye main bas chahta hu aapka saal se hai agar aapko nahi padi aapke catalog ki koi dikat nahi sir mera itna tha mera itna concern tha do saal se main aapka handle kar raha hu aur main aapki service ko proper tarike se servicing de raha hu agar aapko nahi lagta ki India mein aapki koi value hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Payment not received; market slowdown affecting payments.

- Catalog may be closed if payment not received.

- Disagrees with the executive about payment terms.



Resolution:

- Executive stated payment will be released on Tuesday.

- Executive offered MDC service for ₹33,000.

- Executive explained the customer's renewal is due.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, catalog, renewal, mdc, subscription
